metadata.title: CVE-2022-25972 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the gif2h5 functionality of HDF5 Group libhdf5 1.10.4. A specially-crafted GIF file can lead to code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
